works.description:
The album, in Arno Mozart's Gallery,
named  
Knit animals & dolls, includes scanned images of the first pages of 21
Alan  
Dart's copyrighted knitted toy patterns. These are being used as a  
catalogue so that other members can request that they be emailed the whole
 
pattern. This infringes Alan's copyright. The url of the album is below. I
 
tried to report the 21 items separately yesterday but the site wouldn't
let  
me submit them singly. Even so, the oher images in the album will be  
copyrighted to someone, other than Arno Mozart.
